statements.statement: select n.MANHOMICD, n.ICD_NHOM_ID as NHOM_ICD_ID, n.TENNHOMICD, c.MACHUONGICD, c.ICD_CHUONG_ID, c.TENCHUONGICD, i.* from TM_ICD i left join TM_ICD_NHOM n on i.ICD_NHOM_ID = n.ICD_NHOM_ID left join TM_ICD_CHUONG c on n.ICD_CHUONG_ID = c.ICD_CHUONG_ID where i.TAMNGUNG = 0 and n.TAMNGUNG = 0 and c.TAMNGUNG = 0 and i.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
